name: Ingeborg Lounge Chair, Sheepskin M/ Dark Stained Oak, by Flemming Lassen, Audo

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Named after the designer’s artist mother, Ingeborg Winding, the Ingeborg Lounge Chair from 1940 welcomes the sitter with open arms and an irresistibly charming expression. The lounge design features elegant sculptural armrests and an angled frame for comfort. Despite the chair’s petite stature, Ingeborg makes a strong statement in any room. Beautiful from every angle, it fits effortlessly into a given space without taking up too much room. Originally designed with sheepskin upholstery, Ingeborg is today reworked from original archival drawings and available in a range of upholstery fabrics and with natural or dark-oiled oak heartwood legs. Material : Sheepskin Moonlight & Dark Stained Oak DIMENSIONS W: 76 cm / 29,9", D: 81 cm / 31,9", H: 76 cm / 29,9", SH: 40 cm / 15,7" ABOUT THE DESIGNER Flemming Lassen Credited for his role in bringing functionalism to Denmark, Flemming Lassen was an architect and designed noted for his exacting craftsmanship and naïve expression. Lassen drew much of his inspiration from the architect Mies van der Rohe and the tenets of the Bauhaus artistic movement —a less is more approach focused on form, function and novel materials counterbalanced with human needs. His original and distinctive designs with timeless silhouettes still resonate today.
specifications.rawSpecificationsText:
Named after the designer’s artist mother, Ingeborg Winding, the Ingeborg Lounge Chair from 1940 welcomes the sitter with open arms and an irresistibly charming expression. 
The lounge design features elegant sculptural armrests and an angled frame for comfort. Despite the chair’s petite stature, Ingeborg makes a strong statement in any room. Beautiful from every angle, it fits effortlessly into a given space without taking up too much room.
Originally designed with sheepskin upholstery, Ingeborg is today reworked from original archival drawings and available in a range of upholstery fabrics and with natural or dark-oiled oak heartwood legs. 

Material : Sheepskin Moonlight & Dark Stained Oak 

DIMENSIONS
W: 76 cm / 29,9", D: 81 cm / 31,9", H: 76 cm / 29,9", SH: 40 cm / 15,7"  


ABOUT THE DESIGNER
Flemming Lassen
Credited for his role in bringing functionalism to Denmark, Flemming Lassen was an architect and designed noted for his exacting craftsmanship and naïve expression. Lassen drew much of his inspiration from the architect Mies van der Rohe and the tenets of the Bauhaus artistic movement —a less is more approach focused on form, function and novel materials counterbalanced with human needs. His original and distinctive designs with timeless silhouettes still resonate today.
